VIXCO is an integrated De-Fi Platform

[/vc_column_text][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”40″ md_spacing=”40″ sm_spacing=”30″ xs_spacing=”30″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1618537224118{padding-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_btn title=”Whitepaper” style=”outline” shape=”round” color=”white” size=”lg” align=”center” css_animation=”fadeInUp” link=”url:%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2021%2F04%2FVIXCO-Whitepaper_kr.pdf|target:_blank” animation_delay=”.8″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_btn title=”Onepager” style=”outline” shape=”round” color=”white” size=”lg” align=”center” css_animation=”fadeInUp” link=”url:%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2021%2F01%2FV2.0_Vixco_Onepager.pdf|target:_blank” animation_delay=”.8″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”120″ md_spacing=”120″ sm_spacing=”80″ xs_spacing=”60″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”about”][vc_column][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”120″ md_spacing=”120″ sm_spacing=”80″ xs_spacing=”60″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1611130784531{background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}” bg_pos=”right center”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp” width=”1/2″][vc_column_text el_class=”feature_box” css=”.vc_custom_1611199011009{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Feature .01

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading icon_pos=”bottom” stm_title_font_weight=”600″ text=”About VIXCO” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:32px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:40px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”30″ md_spacing=”30″ sm_spacing=”20″ xs_spacing=”20″][vc_column_text el_class=”txt_desc”]VIXCO는 블록체인 De-Fi 서비스와 실제 오프라인 POS, 무인 대출기가 결합된 복합 플랫폼입니다.

POS(Point of Sales) 단말기에 블록체인 지갑을 구현하여 가맹점과 소비자를 연결하는 특화된 서비스를 제공하며, 블록체인의 투명성을 기반으로 결제전표 Data와 실제 정산 Data 사이의 불일치 문제점을 원천적으로 해결합니다.

소비자를 대상으로 스테이킹, 대출 등 금융 서비스를 실생활에서 이용할 수 있는 플랫폼을 제공하는 동시에 탈중앙화 P2P 거래를 통해 빠른 송금 지원과 거래 수수료를 낮춤으로써 온-오프라인 지불 결제 시장을 선도하고자 합니다.[/vc_column_text][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”0″ md_spacing=”0″ sm_spacing=”30″ xs_spacing=”30″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4422″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css_animation=”fadeInRight”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”why”][vc_column][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”80″ md_spacing=”60″ sm_spacing=”50″ xs_spacing=”40″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1611207475080{background-color: #fafafb !important;}”][vc_column][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”48″ md_spacing=”30″ sm_spacing=”20″ xs_spacing=”20″][vc_column_text el_class=”feature_box mid” css=”.vc_custom_1611200135775{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading icon_pos=”bottom” stm_title_font_weight=”600″ text=”Why Choose VIXCO?” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:32px|text_align:center|color:%23000000|line_height:40px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”48″ md_spacing=”30″ sm_spacing=”20″ xs_spacing=”20″][vc_column_text el_class=”txt_desc”]

.04[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading icon_pos=”bottom” stm_title_font_weight=”600″ text=”VIXCO ATM-POS” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:32px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:40px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”30″ md_spacing=”30″ sm_spacing=”30″ xs_spacing=”30″][vc_column_text el_class=”txt_desc txt_lighter”]

전세계 가맹점에서 지불 결제 수단으로 사용할 수 있는 단말기입니다.
현금 인출 서비스를 제공하는 ATM POS 단말기, 신용카드 가맹점 단말기 등 현금인출 서비스를 제공하는 동시에 VIXCO 출금, 결제를 지원합니다.

VIXCO를 보유한 고객은 가상자산 ATM POS 기기가 설치된 가맹점에서 현금과 신용카드를 대신하여 VIXCO를 사용할 수 있습니다.

가상자산 ATM POS는 “신용카드 전표 채권 매입서비스”를 지원하며,
VIXCO로 결제할 경우 실시간 현금 입금은 물론이고 가맹점주의 선택에 따라
가치상승을 기대할 경우 VIXCO로 결제를 받을 수 있도록 설계 되었습니다.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”100″ md_spacing=”80″ sm_spacing=”60″ xs_spacing=”60″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1611541096158{background-color: #fafafb !important;}” el_id=”service”][vc_column][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”80″ md_spacing=”60″ sm_spacing=”50″ xs_spacing=”40″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”pd-r-25″ width=”1/2″][vc_column_text el_class=”feature_box” css=”.vc_custom_1611207898980{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading icon_pos=”bottom” stm_title_font_weight=”600″ text=”Business Infrastructure” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:32px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:40px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”30″ md_spacing=”30″ sm_spacing=”20″ xs_spacing=”20″][vc_column_text el_class=”txt_desc” css=”.vc_custom_1618480704019{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”]

Feature .06

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading icon_pos=”bottom” stm_title_font_weight=”600″ text=”Vixco POS Solution” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:32px|text_align:center|color:%23000000|line_height:40px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”30″ md_spacing=”30″ sm_spacing=”20″ xs_spacing=”20″][vc_single_image image=”4889″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”30″ md_spacing=”30″ sm_spacing=”20″ xs_spacing=”20″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text el_class=”txt_desc” css=”.vc_custom_1618493753534{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”]

VIXCO Payment

신용/직불카드부터 모바일 결제까지 모든 결제 수단을 지원합니다. VIXCO 솔루션에 적용된 결제 솔루션은 EMV L1/L2 인증, EMV Contactless L1 & VISA, MASTER, AMEX, UNION Pay Brand 인증 등 글로벌 최고 수준의 보안을 제공합니다.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text el_class=”txt_desc” css=”.vc_custom_1618493702403{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”]

QR 페이

가맹점, 메뉴, 가격 정보를 매 거래 마다 QR 코드로 생성하여 발전된 형태의 QR 페이 환경을 제공합니다.

Questions and Answers (Q&A), are listed questions and answers, all supposed to be commonly asked in some context

[/vc_column_text][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”48″ md_spacing=”30″ sm_spacing=”20″ xs_spacing=”20″][vc_toggle title=”Financial services using Blockchain based VIXCO”]A combination of Insurance and Technology, which means Insurance version of Fintech.
It aims at the change and development of the insurance industry through harmonization of Insurance and Technology.
Beyond just improving efficiency and productivity, creating new value and changing the insurance industry’s concepts.
Artificial intelligence, big data, and the Internet of Things are tools to efficiently operate the current insurance industry processes, whereas block chains provide an environment that can change the traditional operating principles and concepts of insurance.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”Global Travel Coin VIXCO”]”VIXCO Pay, a tourist mobility easy payment service without borders”, which can be conveniently used by workers and companies in the world tourism industry, which has an annual international travel tourist of 1.1 billion and an annual average growth rate of 3.3% (World Tourism Organization UNWTO 2014 Statistics Report) By providing services and eliminating the inconvenience of international travelers, we will position VIXCO Pay as the best specialized coin in the world tourism industry.
Creating a new tourism service paradigm by providing “Global mobile tourism platform” and Mobile commerce service (M-TravelCommerce Service)
Global tourism industry and mobile payment system as the main payment system lane or Provide Travel Platform service, combining two or more service models to form a new Value Chain and generate revenue for the global tourism industry
Real-time transfer, billing, remittance, on-site payment, 1:1 customized travel sales, unique experience travel, and fair travel services for approximately
A full 1:1 customized, unique experience trip for smartphone era, with around 200,000 global tourism experts and 700,000 overseas mobile travelers operating on the next generation SNS based mobile travel commerce platform that supports real-time networking and one person, easy and convenient travel service realization[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”VIXCO as a Payment Tool for Global Internet Shopping Mall”]FinTech providers are pursuing a role as a financial platform that directly covers the area of settlement of payments or relays. If you look at the payment and remittance sector first, PayPal, Ali Pay is offering prepaid payment and remittance services based on charging account. They open an operator account at a particular financial company, withdraw the amount from the client account when the customer’s account is charged, and transfer it to the operator account. Afterwards, the company acts as a bank by directly performing payment or transfer transactions between the customer account without any separate deposit or withdrawal transactions with the financial company
In addition, the Korean service, toss, is a debit payment or transfer service based on bank accounts that enables payment or transfer from a user account to a member or non-member’s account without the need of a separate charge. In this case, the operator is directly acting as an interbank transit agency as he is handling fund transfer by signing a one-to-one pump-banking contract with individual banks.
Meanwhile, Internet specialized bank becomes directly financial company and provides service of financial instruments such as deposits, loans, funds, and asset management as general bank does, and has a typical financial platform.
Finally, operators of overseas remittances are also to reduce the fees in the process of transferring, intermediate trading, and receiving for eliminates involvement of financial companies and provides services in P2P(peer to peer) manner.
In the case of TransferWise, they directly match the individual demand for remittances abroad in opposite directions, Courancy Fair provides a platform to make transactions with individuals who need overseas remittances These operators are seeking to expand their customer base based on their own platform, which is more rapid and simpler than existing service processes, lower customer fees, and higher profitability.
VIXCO is the best platform to send money fastly and quickly after undergoing certification procedures within the institutional and legal boundaries of each country.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”Currency VIXCO of Payment Mode Using ATM POS Terminal”]The system provides a terminal to use VIXCO as a payment method for merchants around the world Tablet Crypto Currency ATM POS terminal Credit card merchant terminal including system and how to operate it{TERMINAL FOR CREDIT CARD MERCHANT PROVIDING CASHING SERVICE, SYSTEM INCLUDING THE SAME, AND METHOD FOR OPERATING THE SAME} as for the, the details are credit cards that can be used to pay by VIXCO or pay by paying by credit card, as well as cash withdrawal services via the credit card merchant’s terminal.
That is, a user who owns VIXCO can use it as a payment method at a merchant equipped with a Crypto Currency ATM POS device. Through this, VIXCO will be able to use as a general purpose currency instead of cash or credit card in real life, along with its increased availability of general purpose.
VIXCO Crypto Currency ATM POS is “Credit Card Voucher Bond Purchase Service” (Credit Card Slip Bond Buy&Sell Service), And it is designed to receive payment by VIXCO if Crypto Currency VIXCO payment is expected to increase value according to the choice of real time cash deposit as well as merchant’s choice. This enables VIXCO to jump into the Global Digital Bank.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”Credit Card Slip Bond Buy & Sell or Crypto Currency Buy & Sell”]The ” Credit Card Sales Bond Purchase Service ” product is the < purchase and retrieval management of credit card notes previously implemented at the card merchant >, The bank is a product that provides the purchase service of merchant card bonds with the credit card company AA + as the debtor.
Credit card companies have a very high credit rating, so the probability of bankruptcy is zero for credit card companies and there is little probability of failure as a result of the purchase of credit card bonds to merchants.
The card merchant is a creditor of a credit card company approved by a credit card company with a high credit rating, and sells (transfers) the rights of the card bond held by the credit card company to the bank.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”Global Digital Internet Bank”]Since the establishment of the world`s first Internet professional bank SF NB in 1995, more than 50 organizations have operated worldwide, including 20 in the U.S and 8 in Japan.
Recently, in China, financial authorities have licensed banking services to e-commerce companies Alibaba and Tencent, and three internet banking companies such as Webank, Mybank and xWbank have been operating.
The forms of establishment of such Internet specialized banks vary in such ways as how the banks led, how the banks allied with others, and how non-bank financial firms or industrial capital led.
In the case of overseas Internet bank success cases, it can be seen that there are many cases in which financial needs that are not accepted in the existing financial system are implemented as services of non-financial companies.
That is, they target an areas of the class or region that financial institutions can not cover, The use of the existing financial institutions could be diffused successfully by providing users with a greater benefit compared to the previous services.
First, in the field of settlement and remittance, the United States was not suitable for online payment because of frequent use of personal checks, account settlement, and the risk of loss and high commissions charges. In the case of credit cards, there was a problem that accidents were frequent. Therefore, it was able to obtain a great response by providing a service such as PayPal which promptly and easily settles payment without exposing payment information. In China, too, settlement infrastructures such as branches of financial companies, CD / ATM, and credit card merchants were lacking, and fraud among commerce parties was frequent.
In this regard, AliPay provided a charge account based settlement service and a payment settlement service by a third party to meet the needs of the users, thereby achieving a large growth in the use of electronic commerce.[/vc_toggle][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”160″ md_spacing=”120″ sm_spacing=”80″ xs_spacing=”80″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes”][vc_column css_animation=”none”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1533118576058{margin-bottom: -80px !important;}”][mailchimp_form icon=”stm-id_envelope” form_title=”Newsletter Signup” form_subtitle=”Sign up for alerts, special offers, education and updates.”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_section disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1611634061258{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;}”][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/5″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/5″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/5″][stm_icon_box box_style=”style_4″ item_align=”center” alignment=”center” icon=”fab fa-telegram” icon_size=”25″ title=”Telegram”][/stm_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/5″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/5″][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
